sentence.Network_en: These thumps are replaced by thrills when valvular insufficiencies or stenoses or congenital defects are present.

sentence.Network_en: Valvular heart disease, usually aortic and mitral insufficiency, can complicate a variety of systemic diseases.
sentence.Network_cn: 瓣膜性心脏病, 以主动脉瓣及二尖瓣闭锁不全为最常见, 可使各种全身性疾病变得复杂.
